Text: Hey! thanks bluesoul, have a password???
No sound past the opening credits.
Er, so can anyone tell me what the problem is and can I easily sort it out? Usually VLC plays anything but all I have is sound with no picture. HELP! Thx

The character Juliet Hulme is the author Anne Perry.  She acknowledged this shortly before the movie came out as she had been contacted by the media and knew that they were going to reveal this information.

You don't need any password, it's just an .avi file and the subtitles.  

And to the people who get no picture, just sound, you need the Xvid codec, google and install it and VLC will play it just fine. Or go directly here for the codec: http://www.xvid.org/Downloads.15.0.html

Thank you for this fantastic upload Bluesoul.
